Title: Requires certain information be made available to elected officials prior to funding reductions for hospitals and nursing homes
Summary: Requires any information or data produced internally or by an outside consultant used by the governor, the division of the budget, the department of health or any other relevant state agency to justify such reduction be made available to elected officials prior to funding reductions for hospitals and nursing homes.
LawCode: Amd ยง24, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to requiring certain information be made available to elected officials prior to funding reductions for hospitals and nursing homes
